metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19791 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[Apache access rules and SOAP/REST endpoints issue]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-19791` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemonldap-ng - 2.0.7+ds-2
lemonldap-ng-fastcgi-server - 2.0.7+ds-2
lemonldap-ng-handler - 2.0.7+ds-2
lemonldap-ng-uwsgi-app - 2.0.7+ds-2
liblemonldap-ng-common-perl - 2.0.7+ds-2
liblemonldap-ng-handler-perl - 2.0.7+ds-2
liblemonldap-ng-manager-perl - 2.0.7+ds-2
liblemonldap-ng-portal-perl - 2.0.7+ds-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.7+ds-2').
